trans-unit.source: Represents a base class from which all context items must derive.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma classe base a partir do contexto que todos os itens têm de derivar.

trans-unit.source: A context item represents a piece of transient state in a designer.
trans-unit.target: Um item de contexto representa um conjunto de estado transitório no designer.

trans-unit.source: Context items are managed by a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>, which is part of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext> employed by a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner> when representing the workflow model visually.
trans-unit.target: Itens de contexto são geridos por um <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>, que faz parte o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext>utilizada por um <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner>Quando que representa o modelo de fluxo de trabalho visualmente.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager> is returned by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items%2A> property which contains the data that is shared between a host and the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>é devolvido pelo <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items%2A>propriedade que contém os dados que são partilhados entre um anfitrião e o estruturador.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>

trans-unit.source: This data provides the mechanism needed to hook into subscription and change notification.
trans-unit.target: Estes dados fornece o mecanismo de necessárias para estabelecer subscrição e a notificação de alteração.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets the type of item derived from the editing context class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada numa classe derivada, obtém o tipo de item derivada da classe de contexto de edição.

trans-unit.source: This is not implemented for the base <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Não está implementado para a base de <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem>classe.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem>

trans-unit.source: Represents a method that is called on the context item before it is stored in the context item manager.
trans-unit.target: Representa um método que é chamado num item de contexto antes de esta está armazenada no Gestor de item de contexto.

trans-unit.source: The previous item in the context item manager is passed as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O item anterior no Gestor de item de contexto é transmitido como um parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Because items must have default constructors, a default item will be constructed if an item is passed into the context the first time.
trans-unit.target: Porque os itens têm de ter construtores predefinido, um item predefinido será construído se um item é transmitido no contexto de pela primeira vez.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref> within which the change is being made.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"> </xref> dentro do qual está a ser efetuada a alteração.
